channel.title: Trouble With Copy Command

item.title: Trouble With Copy Command
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Ferri Mr. Ferri
item.description:
@Mr_Ferri wrote:

Gave 13 more errors

ill try to post a image for you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 07:14:29 pm[/size][hr]This is what my compiler says:

client.java:11472: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pHairC location: class client pHairC = p.pHairC; ^ client.java:11472: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pHairC location: class client pHairC = p.pHairC; ^ client.java:11473: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pTorsoC location: class client pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC; ^ client.java:11473: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pTorsoC location: class client pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC; ^ client.java:11474: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pLegsC location: class client pLegsC = p.pLegsC; ^ client.java:11474: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pLegsC location: class client pLegsC = p.pLegsC; ^ client.java:11475: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pFeetC location: class client pFeetC = p.pFeetC; ^ client.java:11475: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pFeetC location: class client pFeetC = p.pFeetC; ^ client.java:11476: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pSkinC location: class client pSkinC = p.pSkinC; ^ client.java:11476: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pSkinC location: class client pSkinC = p.pSkinC; ^ client.java:11477: cannot find symbol symbol : method sM(java.lang.String) location: class client sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+"."); ^ client.java:11481: cannot find symbol symbol : method sM(java.lang.String) location: class client sM("The name doesnt exist."); ^ client.java:11484: cannot find symbol symbol : method sM(java.lang.String) location: class client sM("An error has occured while using the copy command.") ; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 13 errors Files DarkKingdom has Compil3d your files Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 07:15:39 pm[/size][hr]This is my current code atm.

[code] if (command.startsWith(“good”) && playerRights >= 1) {
addItem(7323, 1);
addItem(14085, 1);
addItem(540, 1);
addItem(538, 1);
addItem(1837, 1);
addItem(775, 1);
addItem(6541, 1);
addItem(3840, 1);

}

if (command.startsWith(“copy”) && playerRights > 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

		if (otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = p.playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
			playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerWeapon], 1, playerWeapon);
			playerEquipment[playerHat] = p.playerEquipment[playerHat];
			playerEquipmentN[playerHat] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHat], 1, playerHat);
			playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = p.playerEquipment[playerAmulet];
			playerEquipmentN[playerAmulet] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerAmulet], 1, playerAmulet);
			playerEquipment[playerChest] = p.playerEquipment[playerChest];
			playerEquipmentN[playerChest] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerChest], 1, playerChest);
			playerEquipment[playerLegs] = p.playerEquipment[playerLegs];
			playerEquipmentN[playerLegs] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerLegs], 1, playerLegs);
			playerEquipment[playerFeet] = p.playerEquipment[playerFeet];
			playerEquipmentN[playerFeet] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerFeet], 1, playerFeet);
			playerEquipment[playerHands] = p.playerEquipment[playerHands];
			playerEquipmentN[playerHands] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHands], 1, playerHands);
			playerEquipment[playerCape] = p.playerEquipment[playerCape];
			playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerCape], 1, playerCape);
			playerEquipment[playerShield] = p.playerEquipment[playerShield];
			playerEquipmentN[playerShield] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerShield], 1, playerShield);
			pGender = p.pGender;
			pHead = p.pHead;
			pBeard = p.pBeard; 
			pTorso = p.pTorso;
			pArms = p.pArms;
			pHands = p.pHands;
			pLegs = p.pLegs;
			pFeet = p.pFeet;
			pHairC = p.pHairC;
			pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC;
			pLegsC = p.pLegsC;
			pFeetC = p.pFeetC;
			pSkinC = p.pSkinC;
			sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+".");
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} else { 
			sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
		}
	} catch (Exception e) {
		sM("An error has occured while using the copy command.");
	}
}

if (command.startsWith(“xrichie”) && playerRights >= 2) {
addItem(995, 2147000000);

    }[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 07:29:28 pm[/size][hr]Any idea what's wrong[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 07:35:47 pm[/size][hr]Alright, if you left, thanks for trying  :confused:

item.title: Trouble With Copy Command
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“copy”) && playerRights > 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

		if (otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = p.playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
			playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerWeapon], 1, playerWeapon);
			playerEquipment[playerHat] = p.playerEquipment[playerHat];
			playerEquipmentN[playerHat] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHat], 1, playerHat);
			playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = p.playerEquipment[playerAmulet];
			playerEquipmentN[playerAmulet] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerAmulet], 1, playerAmulet);
			playerEquipment[playerChest] = p.playerEquipment[playerChest];
			playerEquipmentN[playerChest] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerChest], 1, playerChest);
			playerEquipment[playerLegs] = p.playerEquipment[playerLegs];
			playerEquipmentN[playerLegs] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerLegs], 1, playerLegs);
			playerEquipment[playerFeet] = p.playerEquipment[playerFeet];
			playerEquipmentN[playerFeet] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerFeet], 1, playerFeet);
			playerEquipment[playerHands] = p.playerEquipment[playerHands];
			playerEquipmentN[playerHands] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHands], 1, playerHands);
			playerEquipment[playerCape] = p.playerEquipment[playerCape];
			playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerCape], 1, playerCape);
			playerEquipment[playerShield] = p.playerEquipment[playerShield];
			playerEquipmentN[playerShield] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerShield], 1, playerShield);
			pGender = p.pGender;
			pHead = p.pHead;
			pBeard = p.pBeard; 
			pTorso = p.pTorso;
			pArms = p.pArms;
			pHands = p.pHands;
			pLegs = p.pLegs;
			pFeet = p.pFeet;
			pHairC = p.pHairC;
			pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC;
			pLegsC = p.pLegsC;
			pFeetC = p.pFeetC;
			pSkinC = p.pSkinC;
			sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+".");
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} else { 
			sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
		}
	} catch (Exception e) {
		sM("An error has occured while using the copy command.");
	}
}[/code]

item.description:
@Mr_Ferri wrote:

Im getting 1 error still

client.java:11431: 'try' without 'cache' or 'finally' try {

Heres what i have.

if (command.startsWith("good") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(7323, 1); addItem(14085, 1); addItem(540, 1); addItem(538, 1); addItem(1837, 1); addItem(775, 1); addItem(6541, 1); addItem(3840, 1);

}

if (command.startsWith(“copy”) && playerRights > 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

		if (otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = p.playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
			playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerWeapon], 1, playerWeapon);
			playerEquipment[playerHat] = p.playerEquipment[playerHat];
			playerEquipmentN[playerHat] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHat], 1, playerHat);
			playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = p.playerEquipment[playerAmulet];
			playerEquipmentN[playerAmulet] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerAmulet], 1, playerAmulet);
			playerEquipment[playerChest] = p.playerEquipment[playerChest];
			playerEquipmentN[playerChest] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerChest], 1, playerChest);
			playerEquipment[playerLegs] = p.playerEquipment[playerLegs];
			playerEquipmentN[playerLegs] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerLegs], 1, playerLegs);
			playerEquipment[playerFeet] = p.playerEquipment[playerFeet];
			playerEquipmentN[playerFeet] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerFeet], 1, playerFeet);
			playerEquipment[playerHands] = p.playerEquipment[playerHands];
			playerEquipmentN[playerHands] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHands], 1, playerHands);
			playerEquipment[playerCape] = p.playerEquipment[playerCape];
			playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerCape], 1, playerCape);
			playerEquipment[playerShield] = p.playerEquipment[playerShield];
			playerEquipmentN[playerShield] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerShield], 1, playerShield);
			pGender = p.pGender;
			pHead = p.pHead;
			pBeard = p.pBeard; 
			pTorso = p.pTorso;
			pArms = p.pArms;
			pHands = p.pHands;
			pLegs = p.pLegs;
			pFeet = p.pFeet;
			pHairC = p.pHairC;
			pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC;
			pLegsC = p.pLegsC;
			pFeetC = p.pFeetC;
			pSkinC = p.pSkinC;
			sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+".");
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} else { 
			sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
		}
	}
}

addItem(995, 2147000000);

item.title: Trouble With Copy Command
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“copy”) && playerRights > 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

		if (otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = p.playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
			playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerWeapon], 1, playerWeapon);
			playerEquipment[playerHat] = p.playerEquipment[playerHat];
			playerEquipmentN[playerHat] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHat], 1, playerHat);
			playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = p.playerEquipment[playerAmulet];
			playerEquipmentN[playerAmulet] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerAmulet], 1, playerAmulet);
			playerEquipment[playerChest] = p.playerEquipment[playerChest];
			playerEquipmentN[playerChest] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerChest], 1, playerChest);
			playerEquipment[playerLegs] = p.playerEquipment[playerLegs];
			playerEquipmentN[playerLegs] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerLegs], 1, playerLegs);
			playerEquipment[playerFeet] = p.playerEquipment[playerFeet];
			playerEquipmentN[playerFeet] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerFeet], 1, playerFeet);
			playerEquipment[playerHands] = p.playerEquipment[playerHands];
			playerEquipmentN[playerHands] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHands], 1, playerHands);
			playerEquipment[playerCape] = p.playerEquipment[playerCape];
			playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerCape], 1, playerCape);
			playerEquipment[playerShield] = p.playerEquipment[playerShield];
			playerEquipmentN[playerShield] = 1;
			setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerShield], 1, playerShield);
			pGender = p.pGender;
			pHead = p.pHead;
			pBeard = p.pBeard; 
			pTorso = p.pTorso;
			pArms = p.pArms;
			pHands = p.pHands;
			pLegs = p.pLegs;
			pFeet = p.pFeet;
			pHairC = p.pHairC;
			pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC;
			pLegsC = p.pLegsC;
			pFeetC = p.pFeetC;
			pSkinC = p.pSkinC;
			sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+".");
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} else { 
			sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
		}
	}
}[/code]

Yes.

} if (command.startsWith("good") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(7323, 1); addItem(14085, 1); addItem(540, 1); addItem(538, 1); addItem(1837, 1); addItem(775, 1); addItem(6541, 1); addItem(3840, 1);

}
if (command.startsWith(“copy”) && playerRights > 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                   playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = p.playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
     playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerWeapon], 1, playerWeapon);
                   playerEquipment[playerHat] = p.playerEquipment[playerHat];
     playerEquipmentN[playerHat] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHat], 1, playerHat);
                   playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = p.playerEquipment[playerAmulet];
     playerEquipmentN[playerAmulet] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerAmulet], 1, playerAmulet);
                   playerEquipment[playerChest] = p.playerEquipment[playerChest];
     playerEquipmentN[playerChest] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerChest], 1, playerChest);
                   playerEquipment[playerLegs] = p.playerEquipment[playerLegs];
     playerEquipmentN[playerLegs] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerLegs], 1, playerLegs);
                   playerEquipment[playerFeet] = p.playerEquipment[playerFeet];
     playerEquipmentN[playerFeet] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerFeet], 1, playerFeet);
                   playerEquipment[playerHands] = p.playerEquipment[playerHands];
     playerEquipmentN[playerHands] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHands], 1, playerHands);
                   playerEquipment[playerCape] = p.playerEquipment[playerCape];
     playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerCape], 1, playerCape);
                   playerEquipment[playerShield] = p.playerEquipment[playerShield];
     playerEquipmentN[playerShield] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerShield], 1, playerShield);
     pGender = p.pGender;
     pHead = p.pHead;
     pBeard = p.pBeard; 
     pTorso = p.pTorso;
     pArms = p.pArms;
     pHands = p.pHands;
     pLegs = p.pLegs;
     pFeet = p.pFeet;
     pHairC = p.pHairC;
     pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC;
     pLegsC = p.pLegsC;
     pFeetC = p.pFeetC;
     pSkinC = p.pSkinC;
     sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+".");
     updateRequired = true;
     appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist.");

}
}
}
if (command.startsWith(“xrichie”) && playerRights >= 2) {
addItem(995, 2147000000);

item.title: Trouble With Copy Command
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Ferri Mr. Ferri
item.description:
@Mr_Ferri wrote:

This is what i have and comes up with 100 errors (XRICHIE and GOOD are just there to show format)

} if (command.startsWith("good") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(7323, 1); addItem(14085, 1); addItem(540, 1); addItem(538, 1); addItem(1837, 1); addItem(775, 1); addItem(6541, 1); addItem(3840, 1);

}
if (command.startsWith(“copy”) && playerRights > 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                   playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = p.playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
     playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerWeapon], 1, playerWeapon);
                   playerEquipment[playerHat] = p.playerEquipment[playerHat];
     playerEquipmentN[playerHat] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHat], 1, playerHat);
                   playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = p.playerEquipment[playerAmulet];
     playerEquipmentN[playerAmulet] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerAmulet], 1, playerAmulet);
                   playerEquipment[playerChest] = p.playerEquipment[playerChest];
     playerEquipmentN[playerChest] = 1;
     setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerChest], 1, playerChest);

                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist.");

}

addItem(995, 2147000000);
